name: Coots Nap Time
description:
Yeet all things that make noise. Collect Coot nap heads to extent nap time. When the timer runs out Cat Nap is over.

*********HEADPHONES***********

Game really benefits from using headphones.

Controls: 

-Left mouse button: pickup/drop

-Right mouse button: Yeet picked up item

Github: https://github.com/chrisdedev/CootsNapTime

Assets Used:

https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-home-set

https://github.com/crazyStewie/godot_simple_first_person_controller/tree/master/...

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Tilt+Warp

https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/

Other then the above:

I did all music/audio and all coding and made the coots nap head model.
